messages.content: Everyone gets a chance again – this General Election is a chance to change direction in Brecon and Radnorshire. Electing a new Liberal Democrat MP will send a message out to the Conservatives that we don’t want to be taken for granted. In return, I promise to stand up for our services, speak out in Parliament for Brecon and Radnorshire, and work for a fairer society with more local investment.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James will fight to protect local jobs.
James will advocate for funding Wales’ NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In Brecon and Radnorshire it’s a clear choice. It’s Lib Dem or Conservatives here.

issues.brexitEurope: James will stand up for Brecon and Radnorshire through Brexit to keep us in the Single Market.
issues.education: James will stand up for roads, education, and broadband in the area.
issues.health: James will oppose the cuts in welfare that hit the most vulnerable.

community.content: James will fight for better roads, healthcare, schools, broadband—and for Wales.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want my children to grow up in an open, tolerant and fair society, not one that turns its back on those most at risk. We need an MP who will represent Brecon and Radnorshire. I will oppose the cuts and stand up for you and your family. I give you my word.

endorsements.endorsement: James Gibson Watt is the positive choice to be our new MP for Brecon and Radnorshire.

images.caption: James Gibson Watt talking with local residents

examples: It’s Lib Dem or Conservatives here.
James will fight for better roads, healthcare, schools, broadband—and for Wales.
James will stand up for roads, education, and broadband in the area.
James will fight for better roads, healthcare, schools, broadband—and for Wales.
